title: Best of The Program | Guests: Jeff Brown & Clarice Schillinger | 3/8/21
description:
Pat Gray stops by to discuss the abundance of “mask Nazis” and a new nose filtration device. Investment analyst Jeff Brown gives insight on the latest investment craze causing some digital art to sell for millions. “Keeping Kids in School PAC” founder Clarice Schillinger argues she has proof that teachers' unions are pressuring schools to stay closed.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
